text:
(7352, 128)
Listing 22.3: Example output from loading one axis of accelerometer data.
Next, it would be useful to load a group of ﬁles, such as all of the body acceleration data
ﬁles as a single group. Ideally, when working with multivariate time series data, it is useful to
have the data structured in the format: [samples, timesteps, features]. This is helpful for
analysis and is the expectation of deep learning models such as convolutional neural networks
